title.rendered: Digiperform emphasizes more on practical learning and provides complete job assistance. – Madhumita

content.rendered:
Hi Readers! Meet Digiperformer Madhumita, currently working as a Social Media Executive in Money Maker Financial Institute. With an experience of more than 2 years as an Inside Sales Specialist in Microsoft Gurgaon, she decided to enhance her skills in digital learning with an aim to have a better career. In chit-chat session, she shared why she decided to enroll in Digital Marketing Training even being an MBA graduate (Marketing) and choose Digiperform for the same. Have a look!  

Digiperform- It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Madhumita- I did MBA in Marketing & was working as an inside sales specialist in Microsoft Gurgaon before enrolling in advanced digital marketing training program. Now, I am working as Social Media Executive at Money Maker Financial Institute.  

Digiperform- What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Madhumita- As we are well aware that India is on the path of digitalization where everything is going digital from banking services to online ordering, advertisements to studies, etc. Even the businesses are focussing more towards digital ways to run their businesses and beat the competition. This made me curious and convinced me to be the part of this booming industry.  

Digiperform- What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Madhumita- I always wanted to join an institute who emphasize on practical learning & provide job assistance. I realized after some online research and queries that Digiperform has all the traits to fulfill my requirements and criteria as a training institute.  

Digiperform- Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Madhumita- Don’t remember as such incident but staffs were very cordial & polite.  

Digiperform- Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Madhumita- Yes, I would recommend it as trusted & reliable source for digital learning as they have kept all the promises which they assured me at the time of taking admission.  

Digiperform- If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Madhumita- I would like to rate training program 8 out of 10.  

Digiperform- Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Madhumita- As a Digital Marketing Expert  

Digiperform- If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Madhumita- Just be focussed while learning and pay more stress on practicals to clear your doubts/queries.  

Digiperform- Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Madhumita- It’s an Excellent Training Institute.   Thanks Madhumita for being part of Digiperform family. We wish you a great success.
